sentences.english: You should now contemplate these twenty-five great Bodhisattvas and Arhats who are beyond study.
sentences.chinese: 汝今觀此二十五無學諸大菩薩，及阿羅漢。

sentences.english: Can we really translate arhat as the 'destroyer of enemies'?
sentences.chinese: 我們能否真的將阿羅漢翻譯成“摧滅仇敵者”？

sentences.english: At that time the twelve hundred arhats, being free in mind, thought to themselves.
sentences.chinese: 爾時千二百阿羅漢心自在者作是念。

sentences.english: Moreover, Shariputra, that Buddha has measureless, limitless Sound-Hearer disciples. All Arhats.
sentences.chinese: 又舍利弗，彼佛有無量無邊聲聞弟子，皆阿羅漢。

sentences.english: This is Arahattaphala: the fruition of Arahantship.
It is hard again to uphold and be perfect in the prohibitive injunctions and to attain arhatship. (16).
sentences.chinese: 要想持戒和很好的守戒而達到阿羅漢是很難的。

sentences.english: Buddhistsadopted the termas an epithet for the Buddha and his arahant disciples.
sentences.chinese: 佛教常以此作爲佛陀和他的阿羅漢弟子的一個別稱。

sentences.english: And I know that the Blessed One, the Arahat Buddha of today, has done so now(20).
sentences.chinese: 我知道聖尊，今天的阿羅漢佛，現在已經做到。

sentences.english: It is good to see such a worthy one.
sentences.chinese: 見這樣一位阿羅漢是件善事。

sentences.english: They all say that they know all and that they are Arahants.
sentences.chinese: 這些老師都說他們無所不知，他們是阿羅漢。

sentences.english: Who has removed the taints and is an Arahant - him do I cal a Brahmin.
sentences.chinese: 他已滅盡了煩惱，是阿羅漢，我稱此人爲婆羅門。
